solution_line_template: He used {tank_used_fraction} of his tank because {total_tank_fraction} - ({tank_left_fraction}) = {tank_used_fraction}
He used {gallons_used} gallons of gas because {total_tank_capacity} x ({tank_used_fraction}) = <<{total_tank_capacity}*{tank_used_fraction}={gallons_used}>>{gallons_used}
He gets {miles_per_gallon} miles per gallon because {total_miles_driven} / {gallons_used} = <<{total_miles_driven}/{gallons_used}={miles_per_gallon}>>{miles_per_gallon}
